dim-opacity.tooltip: Set how transparent unfocused windows should become. Lower values make windows more transparent.

animation-time.tooltip: Time it takes for the dimming animation to complete

animation-type.tooltip: Choose the animation curve for the dimming effect

dim-minimized.tooltip: Whether to apply dimming to minimized windows

exclude-dialogs.tooltip: Don't dim dialog windows (like file choosers, preferences windows, etc.)

toggle-keybinding.tooltip: Keyboard shortcut to temporarily toggle the dimming effect

about.description:
Dim Unfocused Windows v1.0

This extension automatically dims windows when they lose focus, making it easier to identify the active window and reducing visual distractions.

Created based on Cinnamon Spices extension patterns.
